column2: "It doesn't matter how good you're feeling, there's still things you shouldn't do!"
"You came at just the right time. <%me>, can you help me tell her off?"
"Please, I'm really sorry. I won't do it again."
"What did she do? She used Techics inside the city."
"\"Hey, look at this,\" she says, and then, bam! Out of nowhere she casts a Technic!"
"S-Sorry! I thought I might be able to do one so I tried! I didn't mean anything bad by it!"
"Of course! If you had, I would have reported you for it!"
"Uh, I really am sorry!"
"Any use of Techniques inside the city is normally cancelled out."
"Even so, Matoi was able to cast one without even using a rod."
"Unbelievable, I've never even heard of anything like this."
"It's good that she wasn't seen by anyone, otherwise, we'd have an incident on our hands."
"What are you two whispering about?"
"What, your punishment is going to be."
"What? Did I really do something that bad?"
"Can you stop pouting like a child?"
"Anyway, if you want to use Techniques, then we're going to have to prepare a way for you to practice."
"So never, ever, ever do something like that again. Understood?"
"Uh, yes...."
"Rather than trying to hide it, I think it's best if she understood her abilities."
"Also, she's a peculiar case. I don't think others would stay quiet if they found out."
"It might hold back her potential, but we should make her use a tool for fighting."
"And all of this stays between us."
